U

UnderStockException - Exception in businessLogic
Custom exception thrown when a product does not have enough stock to fulfill an order.
UnderStockException() - Constructor for exception businessLogic.UnderStockException
Constructs an UnderStockException with a default error message.
UnderStockException(String) - Constructor for exception businessLogic.UnderStockException
Constructs an UnderStockException with a custom error message.
update(T, int) - Method in class dataAccess.AbstractDAO
Updates an existing entity in the database.
updateClient(Client, int) - Method in class businessLogic.ClientBLL
Updates the information of an existing client in the database.
updateProduct(Product, int) - Method in class businessLogic.ProductBLL
Updates an existing product in the database after validating the product's data.
